entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend and classmate of Harry's, also a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The headmistress of Hogwarts, who is interrogating Harry.

entities.name: millicent bulstrode
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, who is pinioning Hermione against the wall.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student and a rival of Harry's.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: Harry's broomstick, which is being kept under guard in the dungeons.

entities.name: harry's wand
entities.description: A magical tool used by Harry to cast spells.

relationships.description: Umbridge is questioning Harry about his presence in her office.
Millicent Bulstrode is pinioning Hermione against the wall.
Umbridge takes Harry's wand from him.
Millicent Bulstrode also takes Hermione's wand.
